content: by midknight designs yikes stripes cap jennifer l christensen midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr@gmail com yikes stripes cap materials  tahki cotton classic in 2 colors colors a & b  sm - 2 50mm or as needed for gauge  med - 3 25mm or as needed for gauge  lg - 3 75mm hook or as needed for gauge gauge  sm = 7dc per inch  med = 6dc per inch  lg = 5 double_crochet per inch abbreviations chain = chain slp st = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch s skip = skip instructions note the beginning chain 3 of every round always counts as the first stitch rnds 1-9 do not turn at the end of the rnds top of cap with a chain 4 join in 4th chain from the hook to form chain loop round 1- right side chain 3 double_crochet 12 times into the chain loop join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 13 stitches round 2- change to b chain 3 double_crochet into same st 2 double_crochet into next st around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 26 stitches round 3- change to a chain 3 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet into next st 2 double_crochet into next st around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 39 stitches round 4- change to b chain 3 double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 double_crochet into the next st around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 52 stitches round 5- change to a chain 3 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next 3 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 65 stitches round 6- change to b chain 3 double_crochet in the next 3 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next 4 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 78 stitches round 7- change to a chain 3 double_crochet in the next 4 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next 5 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 91 stitches round 8- change to b chain 3 double_crochet in the next 5 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next 6 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st around join with slp st into the 3rd chain of 1st st 104 stitches round 9- change to a chain 3 double_crochet in the next 14 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the next st double_crochet in the next 15 sts 2 double_crochet in the next st around until the last 8 sts double_crochet in
